title: How we build Engineering Resilience at Carta

evaluation.summary: Manager: The article provides valuable insights into building engineering resilience, which is essential for team growth and effective people management. It offers frameworks and practical advice that engineering managers can apply to enhance their teams' adaptability and robustness. | Staff: The article is a valuable resource for senior engineers looking to enhance their understanding of engineering resilience. It provides architectural insights and promotes systems thinking, although it could benefit from more technical depth and examples.

It offers frameworks and practical advice that engineering managers can apply to enhance their teams' adaptability and robustness.
insights: Resilience is crucial for adapting to challenges.
Building resilience can lead to stronger team dynamics.
Practical frameworks can help implement resilience strategies.

title: How we evolved our cloud infrastructure at HashiCorp

evaluation.summary: Manager: The article provides insights into evolving cloud infrastructure, which can aid engineering managers in making informed decisions about technical strategy and process improvements. While it offers practical examples, it is less focused on direct people management or team growth strategies. | Staff: The article provides a comprehensive overview of evolving cloud infrastructure, focusing on architectural decisions and technical challenges. title: Managing Up: Dealing with Your Manager

evaluation.summary: Manager: The article provides valuable insights into managing up, a critical skill for engineering managers to influence higher management and align team goals with organizational objectives. It offers practical advice that can be directly applied to improve leadership effectiveness. | Staff: The article provides insights into managing up, which is valuable for career progression but lacks technical depth. It is more suited for understanding interpersonal dynamics within engineering teams rather than technical challenges.

raw_evaluation.title: Managing Up: Dealing with Your Manager

manager_evaluation.summary: The article provides valuable insights into managing up, a critical skill for engineering managers to influence higher management and align team goals with organizational objectives. It offers practical advice that can be directly applied to improve leadership effectiveness.
insights: Managing up is essential for aligning team objectives with organizational goals.
Influencing higher management requires understanding their priorities and communication styles.
Effective managing up can enhance career growth and team success.
